title: Painting Supplies Quiz
description: How well do you know house painting supplies and techniques? Test your knowledge of brushes, rollers, and finishes.

questions.question: Which type of paint finish has the highest sheen and is most washable, often used on trim and doors?
What is painter's tape (masking tape) used for?
options: Masking off areas you don't want painted to create clean lines

questions.question: Which painting tool is a flat, flexible blade used to fill holes and smooth surfaces before painting?
What is primer used for when painting walls?
options: Preparing the surface for better paint adhesion and coverage

questions.question: Which tool has a padded cylinder that rolls paint onto large, flat surfaces quickly?
What does the 'nap' refer to on a paint roller cover?
options: The thickness of the fuzzy fiber surface

questions.question: Which type of brush is best for cutting in along edges and corners?
What is a drop cloth used for when painting?
options: Protecting floors and furniture from paint drips and spills

questions.question: Which solvent is traditionally used to clean oil-based paint from brushes?
What is spackle (spackling compound) used for?
options: Filling small holes and cracks in walls before painting

questions.question: Which paint finish is completely non-reflective and good for hiding wall imperfections?
What is a paint edger tool designed for?
options: Painting straight lines along ceilings and trim without tape

questions.question: Which device attaches to a paint can and has a screen for removing excess paint from a roller?
What is a 5-in-1 painter's tool used for?
options: Multiple tasks: scraping, cleaning rollers, spreading, gouging, and opening cans

questions.question: Which product is applied between coats of paint to improve adhesion, especially on glossy surfaces?
